CustomAlerts.PluginDescription: The Alerts plugin lets you define custom alerts on any report and metric available in Piwik.
CustomAlerts.SmsAlertContent: %1$s has been triggered for website %4$s as the metric %2$s in report %3$s %5$s.
CustomAlerts.MailAlertContent: %1$s has been triggered as the metric %2$s in report %3$s %4$s.
CustomAlerts.MailText: The triggered alerts are listed in the table below. To adjust your custom alert settings, please sign in and access the Alerts page.
CustomAlerts.AlertDoesNotExist: Alert with ID %d does not exist!
CustomAlerts.AccessException: You are not the owner of the Alert with ID %d
CustomAlerts.AreYouSureDeleteAlert: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?
CustomAlerts.InvalidMetricValue: The metric value must be numeric
CustomAlerts.InvalidMetric: Given metric is not available for given report!
CustomAlerts.ParmeterIsTooLong: %s is too long. Max %d characters allowed.
CustomAlerts.NoAlertsDefined: You haven't created any alerts yet, create one now!
CustomAlerts.NoTriggeredAlerts: There are no triggered alerts yet
CustomAlerts.CancelAndReturnToAlerts: Cancel and %1$sreturn to the list of alerts%2$s
CustomAlerts.InvalidReportCondition: Report condition is not a valid value
CustomAlerts.InvalidMetricCondition: Metric condition is not a valid value
CustomAlerts.DayComparedToPreviousWeek: same day in the previous week
CustomAlerts.DayComparedToPreviousYear: same day in the previous year
CustomAlerts.MonthComparedToPreviousYear: same month in the previous year
CustomAlerts.ScheduledReportsPluginNotActivated: The ScheduledReports plugin is required in order to create or edit alerts. You can activate it by accessing the %1$splugin settings page%2$s.
CustomAlerts.MobileMessagingPluginNotActivated: The MobileMessaging plugin is required to send SMS alerts. You can activate it by accessing the %1$splugin settings page%2$s.
